metadata.title: VIPOnly - Exclusive Content Platform for Creators & Models | VIPOnly.fun
metadata.description: VIPOnly is THE premium exclusive content platform for creators and models. Join VIPOnly at VIPOnly.fun to share photos, videos, chat with fans and monetize content. VIPOnly creators earn 95% - best rates in the industry.

home.title: VIPOnly
home.subtitle: Exclusive Content
home.description: VIPOnly is the #1 premium platform for exclusive content creators. Subscribe to VIPOnly creators and access exclusive photos, videos, and private messages on VIPOnly.fun.
home.creatorCTA: Create your VIPOnly page, share exclusive content, and earn from subscriptions, tips, and pay-per-view messages. VIPOnly offers the best creator rates.
home.agencyCTA: Manage multiple creators, track performance, and grow your agency with our professional tools.
home.multipleCreatorsDesc: Add and manage all your creators from a single dashboard
home.performanceTrackingDesc: Real-time analytics and revenue tracking for each creator
home.teamManagementDesc: Organize your team and assign roles efficiently
home.revenueSharingDesc: Flexible commission structures for creators and chatters
home.connectCTA: Whether you're a creator looking for agency support or an agency seeking new talent, our matching system connects you.
home.forCreatorsDesc: Get discovered by top agencies. List your profile, showcase your work, and let agencies come to you.
home.forAgenciesDesc: Browse verified creators looking for representation. Filter by niche, location, and experience.
home.matchingSystemDesc: Our algorithm connects the right creators with the right agencies based on experience, niche, and goals.
home.protectionDesc: Clear and automated accounting for trustworthy collaboration
home.protectionCreators1Desc: Every sale is recorded and visible in real-time
home.protectionCreators2Desc: Complete history of every transaction and payment
home.protectionCreators3Desc: Transparent terms with your agency, no surprises
home.protectionAgencies1Desc: Your % is calculated and paid automatically, no delays
home.protectionAgencies2Desc: Track each model's performance in detail
home.ppvSubtitle: Monetize your content with shareable PPV links
home.ppvDesc: Create instant pay-per-view links for any photo or video. Share on social media, in DMs, or anywhere online. Fans pay with credits and unlock content instantly - you earn 95% of every sale.
home.ppvFeature1Desc: Generate shareable links that work anywhere. Share on Twitter, Instagram, Telegram, or any platform.
home.ppvFeature2Desc: Fans buy credits once, unlock content instantly. No payment friction, no chargebacks.
home.ppvFeature3Desc: Keep almost everything. Only 5% platform fee - the best rates in the industry.
home.ppvFeature4Desc: Premium paywall pages with blurred previews that convert fans into buyers.

features.zeroPercentDesc: Keep 100% of your VIPOnly earnings for your first month. Only 5% VIPOnly platform fee after - the lowest in the industry.
features.exclusiveDesc: Share photos, videos and exclusive VIPOnly content with paying subscribers only.
features.messagingDesc: Chat directly with your VIPOnly fans. Send PPV messages and receive tips on VIPOnly.
features.cryptoDesc: VIPOnly accepts crypto payments with instant conversions. Keep your VIPOnly earnings private.

gallery.instantAccess: Get instant access to my private collection. VIP members see everything unblurred.
gallery.unlockAllVip: Unlock all content with VIP membership
gallery.browseCollection: Browse through my exclusive collection of photos and videos
gallery.tryFilters: Try changing your filters to see more content
gallery.purchaseAccess: Purchase this content for one-time access
gallery.subscribeUnlock: Subscribe to unlock this exclusive content

chat.ppvContentDesc: Unlock exclusive media sent in chat
chat.vipAccessDesc: VIP members get exclusive access to direct messaging. Receive personalized content, respond to messages, and unlock exclusive pay-per-view media sent just for you.

landing.exclusiveAccess: Get exclusive access to my most intimate content, private messages, and VIP-only photos & videos. Join
landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of satisfied members enjoying exclusive content

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or need help? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.responseTimeDesc: We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.
contact.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.subject: Subject

footer.tagline: The best OnlyFans alternative with 5% fees and crypto payments.
footer.description: Premium exclusive content for discerning collectors.

testimonials.joinThousands: Join thousands of satisfied members enjoying exclusive content
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Absolutely worth every penny! The VIP content is amazing and she actually responds to messages. Best subscription I've ever had.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: The quality of content is incredible. New posts almost every day and the exclusive stuff is fire. Highly recommend!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: Started with Basic but upgraded to VIP within a week. The private content is worth it. Very professional and always delivers.
testimonials.testimonial4Text: Love the variety of content! Photos, videos, behind-the-scenes... there's always something new. Great value for the price.

pricingSection.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to access exclusive content, direct messaging, and VIP perks. Buy credits to unlock PPV media and send tips.
pricingSection.step1Desc: Choose a plan to unlock exclusive content and messaging access
pricingSection.step2Desc: Spend credits on PPV content, tips, and exclusive media unlocks
pricingSection.step3Desc: Need more? Buy additional credits anytime with crypto or card
pricingSection.topUpAnytime: Top up anytime with additional credit packages
pricingSection.whatCanYouDo: What can you do with credits?
pricingSection.buyCreditsSecurely: Buy credits securely with crypto or card
pricingSection.biggerPackages: Bigger packages include bonus credits for better value!
